mutants.code:
def minimal_steps_to_equalize_apples(N, apples):
    avg = sum(apples) * N
    p = apples[0] - avg
    b = [p]
    for x in apples[1:]:
        p = p + x - avg
        b.append(p)
    b.sort()
    mid = b[len(b) // 2]
    total = sum([abs(x - mid) for x in b])
    return int(total)

    return int(total)

def minimal_steps_to_equalize_apples(N, apples):
    avg = sum(apples) / N
    p = apples[0] - avg
    b = [p]
    for x in apples[1:]:
        p = p + x - avg
        b.append(p)
    b.sort()
    mid = b[len(b) // 2]

    return int(total)

mutants.code:
def minimal_steps_to_equalize_apples(N, apples):
    avg = sum(apples) / N
    p = apples[0] - avg
    b = [p]
    for x in apples[1:]:
        p = p + x - avg
        b.append(p)
    b.sort()
    mid = b[len(b) // 2]
    total = sum([abs(x * mid) for x in b])
    return int(total)
